channel.title: Command help!
channel.description: Hey guys, I need to code the following commands in my server, ::copy, ::kill, ::giveitem [id] [amount] [playername], ::vote, and ::sit. I dont remember how to code commands in and if anyone can tell me what files to go into and what i should change it would help me out a lot. Thanks guys.

item.title: Command help!
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

^
But, it goes into commands.java if you’re on pi, and it’d be along the lines of like
if (playerCommandStartsWith(“blahblah”)) {
c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1000000);
}

I think thats how it would look, but thats if you wanted it to add like heaps of whips, just change it to your needs.

Read full topic

item.title: Command help!
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

It depends on what source your using, some sources there’s a file called commands.java, or some sources its located in client.java for old 317 sources, provide more information next time if you want someone to help you.

Read full topic
